name: Midnight Maze (BlueWrench010)
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 135) this is a top down shooter where you try your best to survive 10 waves of all kinds of monstrosities. It is intended to be a bit difficult

The controls are:

[W], [A], [S] and [D] to move

[LeftClick] to shoot

[LeftShift] to quicksprint
